price: هغه ورځ چې ځمكه او غرونه ولړزيږي او غرونه به د شګو خپره شوې ډېرۍ (غوندې) وي.
arabic: يَوۡمَ تَرۡجُفُ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ وَٱلۡجِبَالُ وَكَانَتِ ٱلۡجِبَالُ كَثِيبٗا مَّهِيلًا

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: yawma tarjufu al-arḍu wal-jibālu wakānati al-jibālu kathīban mahīlan
